findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in withdrawFunds
findings.explanation: The contract performs an external call (msg.sender.call.value) before updating the user's balance and lastWithdrawTime, enabling a malicious contract to reenter withdrawFunds and drain funds repeatedly.
findings.fix_suggestion: Move state updates (balances and lastWithdrawTime) before the external call, or implement a reentrancy guard. Alternatively, use transfer() or send() which limit forwarded gas.
